title: Draven has had 2 skins now in the gap of less than 3 patches.

replies.body: Agreed, Draven already has lots of great skins. give some other champs some love!
I think we are forgetting that this is League of Draven. Pls respect Draven and his new minions.
{{champion:119}} Damn straight.
Next patch, Draven will win every game. How fair is that? Nerf pls
As long as Lee Sin is on his team; working as intended.
That stupid meme is not an excuse for Draven getting a skin on the PBE when one was released a month ago.

ill quote overpowered soap, he has a logical answer..

> [{quoted}](name=OverpoweredSoap,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gk2Fn5PQ,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-03-09T02:24:37.330+0000)
>
> It's a skin that literally has his face enlarged to the point that it's a bobble head. 
> 
> I highly doubt much went into it. 
> 
> That being said, yes there are champions who could use more skins.

It's a skin that literally has his face enlarged to the point that it's a bobble head. 

I highly doubt much went into it. 

That being said, yes there are champions who could use more skins.

If they were going to make a bobblehead skin, Draven's really the only guy with the ego to carry it. Even our new sassdragon can't compare. If Sol's ego is a neutron star, Draven is a black hole with a fabulous moustache.

> [{quoted}](name=Bermeme Sanders,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gk2Fn5PQ,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-03-09T08:22:33.527+0000)
>
> If they were going to make a bobblehead skin, Draven's really the only guy with the ego to carry it. Even our new sassdragon can't compare. If Sol's ego is a neutron star, Draven is a black hole with a fabulous moustache.

best comment ever
but Aurelion already has a bobblehead.

>It's a skin that literally has his face enlarged to the point that it's a bobble head.

>I highly doubt much went into it.

I'd probably say it's the other way around.

Enlarging the head requires the artists to heavily modify Draven's model and create a new texture. Beast Hunter was only a new texture. More thought probably went into Beast Hunter but in terms of putting the skin into the game Bobble Head would actually take a lot of work.
I think newer basic skins always include some model work (the hair for example as well as 3d clothing that's not just drawn on the texture)

{{champion:80}}  November 5, 2015 (Slayer Pantheon)

{{champion:14}} sheds no tears.
He simply silently suffers.
best part is.... who the hell even plays draven????
Players who like ADC's that take actual skill

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gk2Fn5PQ,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2016-03-09T04:02:53.260+0000)
>
> Players who like ADC's that take actual skill

Which isn't many players. ADC is comfortably the role where pick rate is most defined by "Who is strongest right now?".

Well that's not entirely the players fault. The ADC as a class only does one thing, right click on something until it dies. It's really hard to play weaker ADC's against a strong one because when it comes down to it, their right clicks hit harder than yours and you can't do anything about that. Perfect example with Kog
But all the ADCs tell me they play Lucian and Ezreal because they're "just a lot of fun" to play.
They are a lot of fun. That's why if ezreal becomes even slightly meta his play rate is through the roof

I was making a tongue-in-cheek remark that people justify it as, "He's just fun" rather than "He's strong right now". Ezreal is no less fun now than he was in Season 5, but ever since he's strong you get all these Ezreals popping out from the woodworks going, "But he's just fun".

No, Ezreal's popularity is largely due to strength. The moment Ezreal is perceived as a 'weak' pick, his playrate'll plummet harder than Hillary Clinton's approval rating.

> [{quoted}](name=Elphege,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gk2Fn5PQ,comment-id=000600000000000100000001,timestamp=2016-03-09T16:08:02.627+0000)
>
> I was making a tongue-in-cheek remark that people justify it as, "He's just fun" rather than "He's strong right now". Ezreal is no less fun now than he was in Season 5, but ever since he's strong you get all these Ezreals popping out from the woodworks going, "But he's just fun".
> 
> No, Ezreal's popularity is largely due to strength. The moment Ezreal is perceived as a 'weak' pick, his playrate'll plummet harder than Hillary Clinton's approval rating.

I got what you were saying I'm js fun is definitely a factor.  People won't play a really weak adc practically no matter how fun they are, but if ezreal is just 'good' not even amazing, he's popular. And on the flip side sivir is super strong rn but I never see her. Cus she borin af
All I know about driven is catching his axes, it doesn't seem that hard. Maybe it is
Catching the axes itself isn't too hard. Catching the axes (which go wherever they want) while kiting while avoiding skillshots while staying in position in teamfights? That's hard.

While managing mana, w's cool down, 3 axes, AND the massive ego.

I love draven <3

~~Draven takes skill...~~

I'm sorry I am illiterate, I thought you were implying that Draven takes no skill. Carry on.
{{item:3070}}{{champion:40}} it's been 494 days. She has a 15% playrate across all elos and is op as fuck. A new {{champion:40}} will for sure make lots of money. please Riot {{item:3070}}
1125 days for poor Cass. {{champion:69}}
Who is Cass? Isn't she Yorick's friend?
Actually she's sharing an apartment with him.
{{champion:69}}  x {{champion:83}}  I'd ship that xD

I'm not convinced Draven Draven took a whole lot of development time compared to the majority of other skins, so theres that. Particularly if they had the head asset made already for the sake of the minions.
{{champion:69}}  more than 3 years....

Poppy already had like 8 skins? Shen 5-6 and Corki 5-6? 

Most people only buy one anyway.
